page.title: 19 LEEDS ROAD SHOPS
page.content: The area on the side of the main railway line from Leeds to York is where industry is to be found.It is called Hornbeam Park.There are many firms on the site which was once occupied solely by ICI fibres.We went to ICI fibres.Once they had 2 500 working there but because of recession the work force was reduced to 400 people only.They made sure that people who were sacked got another job or retired.The site is very pleasant & quiet.We visited Stanleys Toffee. Stanleys Toffee employs 22 staff.They make rock & smarties and other sweets for other firms. The manager says it is a good site because it looks over green fields.They have their own pottery. They have orders every week from places like Lightwater Valley & Harewood House.In one day Stanleys Toffee makes 112lb of boiled sweets.
